about_the_game:
Legacy of Sin: The Father's Sacrifice is the first installment in the Legacy of Sin series. As the captain of the watch, it's your goal to defend the town against the orcish invasion, using just a handful of troops to stem the tide - all rendered in the unique style of 90s TV cartoons. Defend, control, win!

Key features

  • Classic route defense gameplay, focusing on tactical use of available units to drive away the orcish invaders.

  • Four units to choose from, each filling a distinct role taken straight from early modern warfare. Ever wondered how arquebusiers would handle orcs? Now you don't have to .

  • Fifteen levels to clear, from the desperate defense of a town sure to a rugged band of veterans facing off against impossible odds with confidence.

  • Unique hand-drawn animations based on actual medieval weapons and fighting techniques!
